snippet: As James Harding prepares to leave The Times of London, legal filings show that Rebekah Brooks received a $17.6 million severance when she resigned from News International.
abstract: James Harding, editor of The Times of London, announces that he will step down, latest resignation for News Corporation's British newspaper unit; regulatory filings released on same day show that Rebekah Brooks, former chief executive of News International, had received $17.6 million severance package.
lead_paragraph: As James Harding prepares to leave The Times of London, legal filings show that Rebekah Brooks received a $17.6 million severance when she resigned from News International.

headline.seo: Another Editor Steps Down in News Corp. Shake-Up
headline.main: Another Editor Steps Down in Phone Hacking Scandal
headline.print_headline: Another Editor Steps Down In News Corp. Shake-Up

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
